nodes.text: The Zealots of Psusan were one of the many religions that existed in the galaxy. Like many other similar cults, the Zealots considered the moon Jedha a holy site. By 22 BBY, the cult was growing fast. One of the Zealots, a human called Agira Nyrat, notably attempted to recruit a weak-minded individual she met in the Outlander Club on Coruscant.
